has_epona: is_adult and Epona and (can_play(Eponas_Song) or (logic_rules != 'glitchless' and can_hover))
can_use(item):
((item == Dins_Fire or item == Farores_Wind or item == Nayrus_Love or item == Lens_of_Truth) and item and Magic_Meter)
            or ((item == Bow or item == Hammer or item == Iron_Boots or item == Hover_Boots or item == Hookshot or item == Longshot or item == Silver_Gauntlets or item == Golden_Gauntlets or item == Goron_Tunic or item == Zora_Tunic) and is_adult and item)
            or ((item == Fire_Arrows or item == Light_Arrows) and is_adult and Bow and Magic_Meter and item)
            or ((item == Slingshot or item == Boomerang or item == Kokiri_Sword or item == Sticks or item == Deku_Shield) and is_child and item)
            or ((item == Epona) and has_epona)
            or ((item == Scarecrow or item == Distant_Scarecrow) and item)
